POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: hai.tencentcloudapi.com

    "Limit": 1
}

InquirePriceRunInstances.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: hai.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: InquirePriceRunInstances
<公共请求参数>

{
    "ApplicationId": "app-jknfna",
    "BundleType": "S",
    "SystemDisk": {
        "DiskType": "CLOUD_PREMIUM",
        "DiskSize": 250
    },
    "InstanceName": "test"
}
InquirePriceRunInstances.title: 发货询价
